name: Golf Flick Crazy Extreme Course
description:
Think you've played golf on some extreme courses in the past? You haven't seen anything like this! Flick your finger to hit the ball while it is moving. The challenge is to score as many as you can in 60 sec.

Think you got the timing and skill it takes to get the job done? Try it now and find out!

Features include:

* Beautiful, fun graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Smooth physics for nice gameplay
* Addictive gaming

Download right now!
